title: P22 & Sherwood introduce Spooky
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135941/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 6.Oct.2009 10.37am 

For Immediate Release:  
Buffalo, NY- October 6th, 2009

P22 Type Foundry and the Sherwood Collection introduce Spooky by Ted  
Staunton

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/SpookyPoster_3559.png)

Spooky is a chilling font that is evocative of the type used in horror  
films and posters. It’s creepy, it’s kooky...it’s spooky. Perfect for  
invitations, banners or other ghastly uses.

[http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/spooky.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135941/http:/www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/spooky.html "http://www.p22.com/sherwoodtype/spooky.html")  
Introductory offer through October 31st.  
————————————————————————-  
For the month of October, P22 Spooky is also available in a special  
Halloween pack with two sets of must have ornaments from P22- LTC Halloween  
Ornaments and P22 Posada Extras. For more information:

[http://p22.com/products/monthly.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20100103135941/http:/p22.com/products/monthly.html "http://p22.com/products/monthly.html")
